title: Task 1: Describe visual elements of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe a material OR technique used in the construction of the Great Mosque of Djenné.
Response accurately describes one material OR technique used in the construction of the Great Mosque of Djenné.
Response accurately describes two materials OR techniques used in the construction of the Great Mosque of Djenné.

title: Task 2: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately use specific evidence to explain how an architectural feature of the Great Mosque of Djenné demonstrates continuity with global conventions of mosque architecture.
Response accurately uses specific evidence to explain how one architectural feature of the Great Mosque of Djenné demonstrates continuity with global conventions of mosque architecture.

title: Task 3: Explain how a specific work of art demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately use specific evidence to explain how an architectural feature of the Great Mosque of Djenné demonstrates change from global conventions of mosque architecture.
Response accurately uses specific evidence to explain how one architectural feature of the Great Mosque of Djenné demonstrates change from global conventions of mosque architecture.
